title: Israeli institutions to launch Bitcoin tracking funds
description: The funds will enable the Israeli public to invest in Bitcoin in shekels. The price of Bitcoin has risen 113% this year.

title: Cybercrime Advisory : Crypto scammers siphoning off millions of Xmas bonuses
description: Public advised to invest only in BSP supervised digital currency The Cybercrime Investigation and Coordinating Center (CICC) is warning the public against the surge of cryptocurrency investment scams if they do not want their Christmas and year-end bonuses to disappear into thin air. CICC Executive Director Alexander K. Ramos said that banks have noticed a […]

title: BlackRock Bets on Bitcoin: Is the US Dollar Era Over?
description: BlackRock, the world's largest asset manager, stated in its latest ad that Bitcoin is no longer a "radical idea" but a legitimate asset, held or used by over 250 million people worldwide. What's behind the change of heart?
